body.name: Glade Automatic Spray Air Freshener Refill, Scented Air Freshener for Home and Bathroom, Clean Linen, 6.2 Oz, 2 Count
features: One 2 count pack of Glade Automatic Spray Air Freshener Refill, Clean Linen scent, allows you to enjoy the home fragrance of crisp air, fresh laundry, and lily of the valley
Glade clean linen fragrance spray refills deliver a fresh burst every 9, 18 or 36 minutes for a timed fragrance release using Glade's Automatic Spray Dispenser
A great way to decorate the air in any room of your home, these fragrance spray refills can be used as a bedroom, living room or bathroom air freshener spray
Each air freshener spray refill offers up to 60 days of continuous diffused clean linen air freshener fragrance when used on the 36 minute setting

A perfect air freshener for home enhancement, Glade Automatic Sprays offer a wide range of fragrances from coastal and tropical to warm and cozy, deliberately designed to put the power of the air in your hands
body.description: Decorate the air in any room and wrap yourself in laundry bliss with Glade Clean Linen Automatic Spray Refill air freshener for home. Crafted by master perfumers, this air freshener refill pack includes two spray refills designed to give a fresh burst with notes of crisp air, fresh laundry, and lily of the valley every 9, 18 or 36 minutes. Keep it clean with our automatic spray dispenser to create the perfect mood with automatic time-release and boost functions for freshness that lasts up to 60 days of continuous diffused clean linen room fragrance. Simply open the automatic spray unit by squeezing the ribs on the side while pulling the holder's sides apart. Insert a Glade spray refill and choose the time setting to release fragrance. Feel right at home and surround yourself with room freshener fragrance with Glade Automatic Spray Air Freshener Refills.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to use instructions Set it and forget it for up to 60 days of gentle mist at a 36 minute setting. To open the unit squeeze the ribs on the side, while pulling sides of holder apart. Remove the cap from the can and insert the can. Choose a time setting to release fragrance every 9, 18 or 36 minutes or press the 'boost' button anytime for an extra burst of fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean Linen scent is wonderful for bathroom & laundry room!
reviews.reviewText: I’m happy I discovered the Glade Automatic Air Freshener Spray Holder! I had no idea such existed! I researched what filled the holder & found this set of 2 on Amazon for the unbeatable price of $8.48 at the subscribe & save cost. One refill easily is placed in the holder, the holder is closed & you are good to go! There’s a touch tab on the top of the holder to test the spray. This can also be used if you want to give your room an extra boost of scent when you enter. These refills are full of a wonderful clean linen scent! I have one in my bathroom & one in my laundry room. What a noticeable difference these make! Having the setting placed on 36 minutes is sufficient enough for me & enough to fill the room with a long lasting scent. Each room no longer has that dull odor upon entering. It says if you have it set on 36 minutes one will last 60 days. If you want the spritz to come out sooner you can set it at 9 or 18 minutes rather than the 36 minutes. I initially had it set on 18 & found there was too much scent ruminating around the room. 36 minutes is just right. I’ve tried the plug-in odor eliminators & the sit gel kind & they never produced much scent. These are easy to use & full of life! I was concerned about residue left on the floor from the spritz coming out but I’ve thoroughly checked & not once have I noticed anything left behind after a few hours in a room. This is a genius product by Glade that is affordable & economical. The product is recycled which is even better. Based on my experience I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfect into our diffuser. We love the fresh scent and it’s value. Easy to install.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is great!
reviews.reviewText: The whole kit is great for parties to keep the bathroom smelling good. This is also great for dorm rooms, keeps the smells under some control lol You can spray when needed or just set the timer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong and effective
reviews.reviewText: This works and if turned up too high can bring on a headache. Definably find your sweet spot depending on room size and how strong you want it. Definitely excited to try another scent

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good
reviews.reviewText: Out of all the ones I've tried this by far is the best smelling one never disappointed smells nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I set the timer to every 36 minutes in the room where I have the litter box. I scoop about 3x a day and change it out on a regular basis. The scent doesn't last long but I find it still does the job. Try it out for yourself and draw your own conclusions. Depending on where you live, it might be cheaper locally. Where I live, it's a little more expensive than on Amazon.
